description: This instrumentation provides database client metrics for HikariCP 3.0+ connection pools. It reports metrics like connection timeouts, creation time, wait time, and usage time, along with connection pool statistics such as the number of active, idle, and pending connections.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.create_time
metrics.description: The time it took to create a new connection.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.idle.min
metrics.description: The minimum number of idle open connections allowed.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.max
metrics.description: The maximum number of open connections allowed.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.pending_requests
metrics.description: The number of pending requests for an open connection, cumulative for the entire pool.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.timeouts
metrics.description: The number of connection timeouts that have occurred trying to obtain a connection from the pool.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.usage
metrics.description: The number of connections that are currently in state described by the state attribute.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.use_time
metrics.description: The time between borrowing a connection and returning it to the pool.

metrics.name: db.client.connections.wait_time
metrics.description: The time it took to obtain an open connection from the pool.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.count
metrics.description: The number of connections that are currently in state described by the state attribute.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.create_time
metrics.description: The time it took to create a new connection.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.idle.min
metrics.description: The minimum number of idle open connections allowed.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.max
metrics.description: The maximum number of open connections allowed.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.pending_requests
metrics.description: The number of current pending requests for an open connection.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.timeouts
metrics.description: The number of connection timeouts that have occurred trying to obtain a connection from the pool.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.use_time
metrics.description: The time between borrowing a connection and returning it to the pool.

metrics.name: db.client.connection.wait_time
metrics.description: The time it took to obtain an open connection from the pool.
